[code=c]public static int abyssal[] = {592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,4151,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,

{

}[/code]

abyssal can be replaced witha npc id 592 is a item of ashes 4151 is a item of whip work the rest out for urself
